items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.

items.content_html: A lightweight, highly configurable MQTT proxy built on Pipy for efficient MQTT traffic handling, enabling secure and scalable IoT communication. Optimized for low latency and high throughput, the Pipy MQTT Proxy enhances MQTT protocol routing and load balancing with easy deployment and management.

Optimized for low latency and high throughput, the Pipy MQTT Proxy enhances MQTT protocol routing and load balancing with easy deployment and management.
